    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Genie Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2547) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 99 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors. You are trained with [falchions](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), [ranseurs](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35), [scimitars](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), and [tridents](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [geniekin](/Traits.aspx?ID=340) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial geniekin weapons are simple weapons and advanced geniekin weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Genie Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Genie Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2550), [Genie Weapon Flourish](/Feats.aspx?ID=2548)
name: Genie Weapon Familiarity
